ernest
Interface ISalience

All Known Implementing Classes:
Salience
public interface ISalience

A set of sensory stimulations that are salient as a whole. (contiguous visual stimulations with the same color, or contiguous tactile stimulations with the same feeling)

Author:
Olivier

setDirection

void setDirection(int direction)
Parameters:
direction - The central direction of the salience in retinotopic coordinates

Parameters:
distance - The distance of the salience (not used anymore except for debug)

Parameters:
